title: Broadcast station owners want to consolidate. They're struggling to get deals to the finish line
description: Nexstar, Tegna and Sinclair are among the broadcast station groups eager to consolidate as the industry awaits regulatory changes.
content:
The Sinclair Broadcast Group, Inc. headquarters are seen July 17, 2024 in Cockeysville, Maryland.
The broadcast television industry knows it needs to consolidate. It's just struggling with how to do… [+11632 chars]
